overview:
Hi,

My name is Les Toft. I have a backgound in IT and since 1995 I have been a marketing specialist. My experience in small business has given me formidable skills - there’s nothing like living at the sharp end of your financials.

I have also raised money for local charities for 9 years.

A growing concern of mine was the increase in compliance and the cost of doing business. Nudipay was based on the philosophy that increasing the profitability of small business will have positive flow-on effects throughout the economy.

There’s an old saying, ‘I know I’m only one, but I’m still one. And I can’t do everything. But I can do something’

My something is Nudipay…
